title: Is wearing a smartwatch all night harmful? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello This is a common question from people new to smartwatch but i can say after using for over a year. They do not harm anything to you but do more good for you to analyze your sleeping pattern and if there is some improvement to make in your sleep. Just make sure you do not wear your watch very tightly where your wrist is uncomfortable. If you are comfortable then you are good to go. :)
